remarks: Utility theorem: reverse closure for any structure defined as a two-argument function.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2015.)
statement:
elbasov.o $e |- Rel dom O $.
elbasov.s $e |- S = ( X O Y ) $.
elbasov.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
elbasov $p |- ( A e. B -> ( X e. _V /\ Y e. _V ) ) $.
